SYSTEM: 03_SPARQL.pdf: Página 30
36  
“Count categories” 
 
PREFIX ex: <http://example.org/> !
SELECT (Count(DISTINCT ?T) AS ?C)!
WHERE { ?Item rdf:type ?T }!
 
Aggregates 
@prefix ex: <http://example.org/> . 
 
ex:lemonade1    ex:price 3 ;  
                rdf:type ex:Softdrink. 
ex:beer1        ex:price 3; 
                rdf:type ex:Beer. 
ex:wine1        ex:price 3.50 ; 
                rdf:type ex:Wine. 
ex:wine2        ex:price 4 . 
                rdf:type ex:Wine. 
ex:wine3        ex:price "n/a”; 
                rdf:type ex:Wine.
